document.full_text: italians voted on sunday in local election run-offs where prime minister silvio berlusconi's center-right coalition risks humiliating defeat in his home town of milan for the first time in nearly 20 years.
document.title: berlusconi risks defeat in local election run-offs
lines_and_colors: italians voted on sunday in local election run-offs where prime minister silvio berlusconi's center-right coalition risks humiliating defeat in his home town of milan for the first time in nearly 20 years.
